overview:
Lauren Miller is the Co-Founder and COO of TinyMassive. Lauren splits her time between .NET, herding cats and her obsession with customer feedback. After Kate pleaded, Lauren threw in the towel with IBM and helped found Lunawarehouse.com, managing operations and customer support. She left after the site was aquired in May 2007 to start TinyMassive.com without Kate having to wear her down this time.

Before 2003, Lauren was a 25 year veteran at IBM where she was shuffled from group to group in order to hone her cat herding skills and save said groups gazillions of dollars. In between trying to create the longest and most complicated formula in the history of Excel, Lauren claims to have met the guy who invented the Escape key.

Lauren attended St Edwards University in Austin, TX and as the most talented chef at TinyMassive.com, supplements her teams liquid diet.
